user.title: Local Weather Forecast Setup
user.description: Configure your local weather forecast based on barometric pressure. This integration provides ~94% accurate weather predictions without external API dependencies.

data_description.pressure_sensor: Barometric pressure sensor (required). Supports hPa, mbar, inHg, mmHg - automatically converted.
data_description.temperature_sensor: Temperature sensor (needed if pressure is not at sea level). Supports °C, °F, K - automatically converted.
data_description.wind_direction_sensor: Wind direction in degrees (0-360°). Improves forecast accuracy, especially for detecting weather fronts.
data_description.wind_speed_sensor: Wind speed sensor. Supports m/s, km/h, mph, ft/s, knots - automatically converted. Improves forecast accuracy by determining wind factor.
data_description.elevation: Your location's elevation in meters above sea level (used to calculate sea level pressure from station pressure).
data_description.pressure_type: Select whether your sensor provides absolute station pressure (QFE) or relative sea level pressure (QNH). Most sensors provide absolute pressure.
data_description.hemisphere: Your hemisphere for seasonal weather adjustments. Auto-detected from Home Assistant location (latitude >= 0 = North, < 0 = South).
data_description.forecast_model: Choose forecast algorithm: Enhanced (combines both, recommended ~98% accuracy), Zambretti (classic, optimized for rising/falling pressure), or Negretti-Zambra (slide rule method, conservative).

error.sensor_not_found: Sensor entity not found. Please check the entity ID.
error.invalid_elevation: Elevation must be between 0 and 9000 meters.
error.sensor_validation_error: Error validating sensor. The sensor may have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.
error.update_failed: Failed to update configuration. Please try again.

init.title: Local Weather Forecast Options
init.description: Update your local weather forecast configuration.

data_description.pressure_sensor: Barometric pressure sensor (required). Supports hPa, mbar, inHg, mmHg - automatically converted.
data_description.humidity_sensor: Humidity sensor for enhanced fog risk detection, dew point calculation, and precipitation probability. Supports % units (optional)
data_description.wind_gust_sensor: Wind gust sensor. Supports m/s, km/h, mph, ft/s, knots - automatically converted. Used for atmospheric stability detection and severe weather alerts (optional)
data_description.rain_rate_sensor: Precipitation detection sensor with device_class='precipitation'. Supports mm, in - automatically converted. The integration automatically detects precipitation when sensor value > 0 (Netatmo: increments 0.101, 0.202... / Ecowitt WS90: similar). Do NOT use hourly total sensors (optional)
data_description.solar_radiation_sensor: Solar radiation sensor in W/m² for accurate feels-like temperature and cloudiness detection (optional)
data_description.hemisphere: Your hemisphere for seasonal weather adjustments. Auto-detected from Home Assistant location (latitude >= 0 = North, < 0 = South).
data_description.forecast_model: Choose forecast algorithm: Enhanced (combines both, recommended ~98% accuracy), Zambretti (classic, optimized for rising/falling pressure), or Negretti-Zambra (slide rule method, conservative).
data_description.enable_weather_entity: Create a weather entity that can be used in weather cards and automations
